both large and small teams to create innovative solutions.

Company Name City , State Teacher
Teaching a variety of asynchronous courses (Law, Government, Algebra, Sociology, Pennsylvania History, Political Science) to all students

As SAP coordinator duties included identifying and communication to the appropriate team members those student behaviors that presented
